India is a land of diversities . The culture tradition language food etc are entirely different in different states of India. In a Delhi centred governance , the south Indian states donot get any prominence on their needs and demands. Thus an insecurity arises in south Indian people under such a governance. I totally disagree with the concept of dravida nadu as it will surely lead to further splitting and total failure . The five south Indian states have there on issues within themselves. Like cauvery issue ( Karnataka Vs Tamil nadu) mullaperiyar dam issue ( Kerala Vs tamilnadu) and Andrapradesh Vs telegana .
